tags.name: no-ssr
tags.description: This component is used to purposely render a component only on client-side. To import a component only on the client, register the component in a client-side only plugin.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: Use a text as placeholder until `<no-ssr />` is mounted on client-side.

slots.name: placeholder
slots.description: Use a slot as placeholder until `<no-ssr />` is mounted on client-side.
